title: How to Play Clash of Clans on PC

steps.title: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com/download.html in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com/download.html in a web browser. This is the download page for Bluestacks. Bluestacks is an Android emulator for PC and Mac. Other popular Android emulators include Nox App Player, LeapDroid, Memu, GenyMotion, and Droid4X.

steps.title: Install Bluestacks on your computer.
steps.content: Install Bluestacks on your computer. Use the following instructions to download and install Bluestacks. Click Download Bluestacks , or use the drop-down menu on the right to select Mac , Windows 32-bit , or Windows 64-bit . Then use the drop-down menu to select Android 32-bit or Android 64-bit . Double-click the Bluestacks installer file and click Install Now . Follow the install instructions (if there are any).

steps.title: Open Bluestacks.
steps.content: Open Bluestacks. Bluestacks has an icon that resembles a stack of colored papers. Click the icon on your desktop, Applications folder, or Windows Start menu to launch Bluestacks. it may take a few minutes to load, depending on your PC's performance.

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store .
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store . The first time you open Bluestacks, it asks you to sign in to the Google Play Store. If you are not asked to sign in, click the icon that resembles a white shopping bag with a colorful triangle on it.

steps.title: Sign in to the Google Play Store.
steps.content: Sign in to the Google Play Store. When you first open the Google Play Store, click the green button that says Sign In . Then sign in with the email address and password associated with your Google account. If you are asked to agree to the terms of service, click I agree .

steps.title: Type clash of clans in the search bar and press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Type clash of clans in the search bar and press ↵ Enter . The search bar is at the top of the page. This displays Clash of Clans among the search results.

steps.title: Click Install next to "Clash of Clans."
steps.content: Click Install next to "Clash of Clans." Clash of Clans has an icon with a blond barbarian. Click Install to the right of the Clash of Clans icon to install it.

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans. Once Clash of Clans is finished installing in Bluestacks, you can either click Open in the Google Play Store to launch the game, or you can click the Home tab at the top of Bluestacks to return to your home screen. Click the Clash of Clans icon on the Bluestacks home screen or your desktop to launch Clash of Clans. Tap by using your mouse cursor to point and click. Zoom in and out by pressing the Up and Down arrows on your keyboard.
